html: 5.31.16  1:04 pm   Last night I had a dream you died! I was looking down this very questions page, reading all of the "are you gonna do more history of japan-type videos" questions and I shed a tear, quietly sobbing that now you never would. I look into the distance thinking that it was such a waste of a talent with so much as-yet untapped potential. Then I was taking away by a dolphin who was whispering that one day we would all join you.
